function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global environmental changes such as climate change and ecosystem shifts altering the thresholds of the planet","Impact":"Increased risk of vectorborne diseases and their transmission to human and animal populations","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable environmental policies, reducing greenhouse gas emissions, and enhancing ecosystem resilience","Technologies":"Climate modeling, environmental monitoring systems, sustainable energy technologies","People":"Human and animal populations","Owner":"Policy makers, environmental organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the complex ways in which global changes affect human, animal, and natural systems","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness and response to health risks posed by global changes","Mitigation":"Investing in research and data collection to improve understanding, developing early warning systems, and enhancing cross-disciplinary collaboration","Technologies":"Data analytics, early warning systems, interdisciplinary research platforms","People":"Public health practitioners, researchers, and policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Continued high incidence and distribution of vectorborne diseases (VBDs)","Impact":"Major sources of death, disease, and disability worldwide, affecting approximately half of the world's population","Mitigation":"Implementing vector control measures, improving access to healthcare, and investing in disease surveillance and monitoring","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, remote sensing, disease surveillance systems","People":"Human and animal populations","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health practitioners, and government agencies"}]}
